ygData.subject: Re: new here...used to play eq
ygData.msgSnippet: The PS2 will support a connection other than a phone line. It will connect as fast if not faster than your computer. You don t have to worry about your
ygData.messageBody:
The PS2 will support a connection other than
a<br>phone line. It will connect as fast if not faster
than<br>your computer. You don't have to worry about your
Hard<br>Drive crashing or some other nasty computer
problem<br>with the PS2. It has a GREAT video graphis
support,<br>AND it playes DVDs without a seperate CD-ROM
drive.<br>The computer has its advantages also but it will
put<br>a HUGE dent in your wallet compared to the PS2.
My<br>opinion is to get the PS2. Besides Computers are
outdated<br>every 30 seconds, but with the PS2 you're sure it
will<br>be up to date for years (until PS3).
